Texts.Eng: Help the Apex Rebels with their hostage situation.
Thank you for rescuing me! There's a teleporter in the basement, we can use that to escape! Before that, though, take this! You've earned it.
The map has directions showing the coordinates to a far-off snowy world where an apex rebel outpost lies. It seems they have a hostage situation on their hands...you could help, if you're interested.
